mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.node_name, t.system_os, t.system_up_time, t.cpu_version, t.cpu_counts, t.cpu_percent, t.used_mem, t.total_mem, t.available_mem, t.mem_percent, t.used_swap, t.total_swap, t.free_swap, t.swap_percent, t.total_disk, t.free_disk, t.used_disk, t.net_send_bytes, t.net_recv_bytes, t.net_send_bytes_per_second, t.net_recv_bytes_per_second, t.gmt_create FROM (SELECT node_name, MAX(gmt_create) AS gmt_create FROM sp_node_agent GROUP BY node_name) a LEFT JOIN sp_node_agent t ON t.node_name = a.node_name AND t.gmt_create = a.gmt_create AND t.gmt_create > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 second)
